data.subTitle: 构造函数和原型中的return
data.content:
function Fun(){
    this.a = 10;
    this.b = 5;
    return ...    //默认为隐式return {a:10,b:5},
                  //如果为显式return且值为基本类型值(number,string,boolean,undefined,null)将无视这个return
                  //如果为显式return且值为引用类型值(object,array,function,regexp)将return这个值
}
